short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An helper with decision making so you can select the best team to play for a possible victory!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will show you interesting data so you can make the best decision, choose the player to win the match.
